document_data.mainbody:
Gribbo was a goblin cultist of the Absolute who dwelled within the Shattered Sanctum during the late 15 century DR.
She wore a simple, stitched leather dress that she kept cinched with a cloth belt.
In the , the cultists of the Absolute launched a terrible raid against the Waukeens Rest inn, killing many and capturing others. It was around that time that Gribbo caught her very own "Pigeon", a rather famous bard by the name of Volothamp Geddarm. Gribbo had Volo perform recitations in front of her fellow Absolutists. For the occasion he crafted an ode to their leader, Dror Ragzlin.
Gribbo knew she should hand over her prized "Pidge" to her superior Minthara Baenre, but was so captivated by his charm she could not bring herself to let him go.
